title: Tech Moves: Providence leader returns to Amazon; Seattle marketing vet joins LiveRamp; and more - GeekWire
content: Tech Moves: Providence leader returns to Amazon; Seattle marketing vet joins LiveRamp; and more  GeekWire
description: — Jessica Shapiro will join LiveRamp as its chief marketing officer. Shapiro is marketing veteran, previously working in leadership roles at companies including Microsoft, Starbucks, Zulily…
